content: welome to richard cup cozy the perfect solution to keeping your coffee warm and your hands from burning this easy-to-make cup cozy fits most 20 oz starbucks cups or other costa takeaway cups so you can enjoy your favorite drinks on-the-go our cup cozy is not only practical but also makes a great last minute gift idea surprise your friends and family with a combination of a reusable cup and a gift card along with this cozy even better our crochet pattern is easy to work it with only half treble_crochet and slip stitches plus it s crocheted in the round so there s no need for any additional seaming start your crocheting projects with the richard cup cozy and make sure to take it with you wherever you go whether you re running errands travelling to work out with the kids or for a brisk walk with your dog keep your coffee hot and your hands safe ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification ❤ size fits a 20oz takeaway coffee cup as standard although one of my testers tried it on the 30oz and it also fit that one ❤ materials #4 worsted weight cotton yarn approx 42 yards size h-5mm hook scissors yarn needle
